message: Let's divide fairly, I'll take a bit more
Your offer was a bit too greedy for me. How about a slightly more even split this time?
I'll compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more
We're running out of time, Alice. Let's be reasonable. This is a fair offer.
I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and yours
This is my final offer, Alice. A 50/50 split is the only fair solution. Take it or leave it.
